channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Car Debris, 26th November
item.description:
On Gravel Hill at the junction with Albion Road, Bexleyheath: A road traffic collision has resulted in large black parts of car debris at the roundabout. The debris is both on the road and on the roundabout. Please can the debris be removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gravel Hill, Bexley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Keep Left Bollard, 26th November
item.description:
